title: Explosive potion

properties.name: description
properties.value: Explosive potions are found on tables in the Castle Wars equipment rooms. They can be used to instantly destroy barricades or destroy the enemy catapult. It can also be used to clear or collapse the cave walls in the underground tunnel connecting the two castles. This is a useful strategy that many players employ, since dropping the rockslide on another player instantly kills them. These potions can't be taken outside of the Castle Wars area. If a player drops an explosive potion, it will cause damage based on your maximum hitpoints.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Explosive potion
For the explosive potion in Soul Wars, see Explosive potion (Soul Wars).
Explosive potion
Released13 December 2004 (Update)
MembersNo
Quest itemNo
Properties
TradeableYes
EquipableNo
StackableNo
NoteableYes
DestroyDrop
ExamineI could use this to destroy things...
Values
Value1 coin
High alch0 coins
Low alch0 coins
Weight0.035 kg
Advanced data
Item ID4045

Explosive potions are found on tables in the Castle Wars equipment rooms. They can be used to instantly destroy barricades or destroy the enemy catapult. It can also be used to clear or collapse the cave walls in the underground tunnel connecting the two castles. This is a useful strategy that many players employ, since dropping the rockslide on another player instantly kills them. These potions can't be taken outside of the Castle Wars area. If a player drops an explosive potion, it will cause damage based on your maximum hitpoints.

It is recommended that the flag runner takes a few of these as it is common for the opposing team to barricade the flag room. When the flag runner gets the opposing team's flag, they are useful to halt pursuers temporarily by collapsing the rocks in the underground tunnels.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
20 July 2017
(update)

The item was made available to free-to-play players.
